name: Quack Attuack
description:
Avoid the Quaboom, get his controller and try to explode your friends, but be careful, you will lose control and he may attack you!

Up to 4 players:

Player 1: arrow keys

Player 2: W A S D keys

Player 3:  T F G H keys

Player 4: I J K L keys

You can also use a game controller to play.

Music: “Star Way”, from PlayOnLoop.com
